member.name: T:OpenRA.Mods.Cnc.FileFormats.CRC32
member.summary: Static class that uses a lookup table to calculates CRC32 checksums of input strings.

member.name: M:OpenRA.Mods.Cnc.FileFormats.CRC32.Calculate(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.UInt32)
member.summary: A CRC32 implementation that can be used on spans of bytes.
member.param: The data from which to calculate the checksum.

member.name: M:OpenRA.Mods.Cnc.FileFormats.CRC32.Calculate(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: A CRC32 implementation that can be used on spans of bytes, with default polynomial.
member.param: The data from which to calculate the checksum.

member.name: T:OpenRA.Mods.Cnc.FileSystem.MegV3Loader
member.summary: This class supports loading unencrypted V3 .meg files using reference documentation from here https://modtools.petrolution.net/docs/MegFileFormat.

member.name: M:OpenRA.Mods.Cnc.Util.ClassicIndexFacing(OpenRA.WAngle,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculate the frame index (between 0..numFrames) that should be used for the given facing value, accounting for the non-linear facing mapping for sprites with 32 directions.

member.name: M:OpenRA.Mods.Cnc.Util.ClassicQuantizeFacing(OpenRA.WAngle,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rounds the given facing value to the nearest quantized step, accounting for the non-linear facing mapping for sprites with 32 directions.

member.summary: Convert TS relative position to OpenRA MPos, accounting for map cordons.

member.summary: Convert TS relative position to OpenRA MPos, accounting for map cordons.
